title: Car Mechanic Simulator 2018 v1.4.7 + 4 DLC
description:
Title: Car Mechanic Simulator 2018
Genre: Racing, Simulation
Developer: Red Dot Games 
Publisher: PlayWay S.A.	
Release Date: Jul 28, 2017

Build and expand your repair service empire in this incredibly detailed and highly realistic simulation game, where attention to car detail is astonishing. Find classic, unique cars in the new Barn Find module and Junkyard module. You can even add your self-made car in the Car Editor.

Patchnotes of version 1.4.7 : 

- name and condition showing in popup fixed
- seats and sterring wheels will count into car total value
- West Virginia licence plate bug fixed
- buying car on barn money bug fixed
- castor earthquake rex camo livery added
- run dyno button will be disables when dyno is working

DLC : 

Car Mechanic Simulator 2018 - Dodge
Car Mechanic Simulator 2018 - Mazda
Car Mechanic Simulator 2018 - Jeep DLC
Car Mechanic Simulator 2018 - Tuning DLC

How to play : 

Mount or burn the iso
Install the game
Play
AND DONT FORGET TO SEED
